vcluster.managers

Class CloudManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vcluster.managers.CloudManager

  • public class CloudManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that presents functions to manage the clouds. Since vcluster only has one cloudmanager, all it's functions are static.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudManager() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String dump() 
      static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Cloud> getCloudList()
      Get the registered clouds list
      static Cloud getCurrentCloud()
      Get the current activity cloud.
      static java.lang.String loadCloud(java.lang.String[] name)
      Load the given clouds in vcluster. vlcusetr would communicate with the real clouds system and get the virtual machines information.
      static java.lang.String registerCloud(java.lang.String confFile)
      Register a cloud on vcluster use the given configurations
      static void setCurrentCloud(Cloud cloud)
      Set the current activity cloud, all the operations should be performed on the current cloud.
      static boolean unLoadCloud(java.lang.String[] name)
      Unload the given clouds from vcluster. the status of the unloaded clouds would be switched to "unloaded" the virtual machines that belongs to those clouds would be removed from data structure.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getCurrentCloud

        public static Cloud getCurrentCloud()
        Get the current activity cloud.
        Returns:
        An instance of a cloud.

        public static java.lang.String registerCloud(java.lang.String confFile)
        Register a cloud on vcluster use the given configurations
        Parameters:
        confFile, - the configuration file path.

      • getCloudList

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Cloud> getCloudList()
        Get the registered clouds list

      • dump

        public static java.lang.String dump()

      • loadCloud

        public static java.lang.String loadCloud(java.lang.String[] name)
        Load the given clouds in vcluster. vlcusetr would communicate with the real clouds system and get the virtual machines information.
        Parameters:
        An - array of the given clouds' names

      • unLoadCloud

        public static boolean unLoadCloud(java.lang.String[] name)
        Unload the given clouds from vcluster. the status of the unloaded clouds would be switched to "unloaded" the virtual machines that belongs to those clouds would be removed from data structure.
        Parameters:
        An - array of the given clouds' names
